message: This is a high-quality product, and I'm offering it to you for $10000. I want to make a deal, but I need you to take a chance on it. If you buy it, you'll not only get a great product, but you'll also be supporting a business that values quality and customer satisfaction. Plus, I'm willing to throw in a 100% satisfaction guarantee: if you're not completely happy with the product, I'll work with you to make it right. What do you say?
